title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Explore the life of Thaddeus Kosciuszko  See exhibits highlighting Kosciuszko's military career in Poland and America Look for the link from the chain and boom at West Point Ask for a Junior Ranger Activity Book Get your National Park Passport stamp Make a purchase from the sales center Explore the traveling trunk Learn about the monuments to Kosciuszko all over the world Investigate Kosciuszko's views on slavery Read about Kosciuszko's visitors - Dr. Benjamin Rush, Chief Little Turtle, Thomas Jefferson and many others See the furnished bedchamber where Kosciuszko stayed   Park rangers can answer questions and provide in-depth information concerning the Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial as well as Independence National Historical Park.
